profileText: a Representative from Ohio; born in Ohio, November 13, 1988; graduated from Shaker Heights High School, Shaker Heights, Ohio, 2007; attended University of Arizona, Tucson, Ariz.; B.A., Cleveland State University, Cleveland, Ohio, 2013; United States Marine Corps Reserve, 2013-2019; campaign staff, presidential election of Donald J. Trump, 2016; staff, President Donald J. Trump, 2017-2021; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 2023-present).
